Description: Limestone ostracon: on both recto and verso are two columns of text: a list of symbols or name markers.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: A. McDowell, 'Hieratic Ostraca in the Hunterian Museum, Glasgow' (Oxford, 1993), pp.5 and 19-20; B. Haring, ‘Göttinger Miszellen’ 178 (Göttingen, 2000), pp.45-58; S. Birch, 'Inscriptions in the Hieratic and Demotic Character, from the Collections of the British Museum' (London, 1868), pl.VII.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136358) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136358)
